title: Bone Thief

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Stay home at night and kill all visitors
-Lure a visitor

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Any players visiting you will be dealt an unstoppable attack because you steal their fucking bones
-Twice a game you can “mimic” another player’s voice, forcing your target to visit you. This bypasses redirect immunity
-Your victim’s will shall be unreadable due to it being blown away by the wind after they were made boneless

desc:
Post 2652
_Didn’t you ever learn that staring is rude?_
